mtctIg9P.title: The Feature Parameter Analysis of Radar Signal Based on Best Grouping in Histogram
mtctIg9P.abstract: In order to recognize radar signals,the signal parameters are usually taken feature extraction at first.The common method adopted in feature extraction of radar signal parameters is equal-width histogram,but the group number of this method is fixed on artificially,so there are some disadvantages in it.For this problem,a quantified synthetic estimate index is proposed to make sure the best grouping of histogram in this paper,which brings impersonality and speediness to histogram making process.Lastly,the best grouping histogram method based on quantified synthetic estimate index is applied in radar signal frequency parameter analysis,simulation and its results show that the method in this paper is fast,correct and can be realized easily,so it supplies a convenient tool for this kind of problems.

YCDr2loq.title: The Image Recognition Method of Radar Signal Parameter Types
YCDr2loq.abstract: At present,radar emitter recognition is usually on the basis of getting the feature parameters' values and types,and then the system and usage of the emitter can be deduced by this information in our country.For the continuous appearance of new and different complex radars,the required parameter information often cannot be gained correctly by the classical radar emitter parameter analysis method,which makes emitter recognition face rigorous challenge.Considering this problem,a wholly new method of parameter type judgment is proposed in this paper,which is called image recognition method.This method is simple in theory and can be realized easily.Its recognition results can be gained fast and intuitively.The simulation experiment results show that this new method is of practicability and validity in radar signal parameter type judgment.

vW20ylNH.title: An Algorithm for Radar Emitter Recognition Based on Pulse Sample Figure
vW20ylNH.abstract: Radar emitter recognition is the critical segment of radar EW reconnaissance signal processing.For the system of radar becoming more and more complex nowadays,traditional radar emitter recognition are facing more and more flinty problems.An algorithm of radar emitter recognition based on pulse sample figure is proposed in this paper.In this algorithm,complete sorting and feature extraction in traditional emitter recognition are unnecessary,so the processing step is simplified.Very high correct recognition rate can be got with this algorithm when the density of data pulse sequence is moderate.Simulation results show that the algorithm is available and practical.

r1JqFAzB.title: Recognition Model of Radar Signal Based on Rough Set with Granulation and Decision Tree
r1JqFAzB.abstract: The significance of attribute in information system is defined by applying the concept of granulation; then the significance of attribute can be treated as the heuristic information to attribute reduction in rough set. In the process of constructing a decision tree, weighted mean roughness, a new concept based on rough set theory which is regarded as the criteria for choosing attributes is applied. The model which combines rough set and decision tree is used in radar signal recognition and the experiments show that the decision tree constructed in this paper is simpler in structure, and can improve the efficiency of classification.

QGevnfFH.title: FUZZY PATTERN RECOGNITION FOR RADAR SIGNALS BASED ON ROUGH SET FIXED WEIGHT
QGevnfFH.abstract: The purpose of reconnaissance system's information processing is signal recognition,which is also a key step in whole process of radar countermeasure information processing.In order to solve the problem of radar signal's intelligent recognition,a radar signal recognition method which combines rough set closely with fuzzy pattern recognition is studied.Firstly,the recognition weight of each feature parameters in radar signal is defined with attribute importance of rough set theory,then radar signals are matching recognised in combination with the method of fuzzy pattern recognition.This method makes full use of the original data as well as embodies the signal's characteristic itself.The simulation experiment and its results validate and show that the method is applicable and effective.

OMR3s6jK.abstract: In nowadays network education,collaboration education pattern was became its core pattern.However,the Traditional Collaboration Education System has many problems: the System reliability and the extension were bad,could not use the client side resources fully,moreover collaboration was not high.The computation model based on the Agent P2P was made up the traditional system flaw exactly.It was designet a set of Web Teaching System based on this model.

4HSVMeKi.title: Modeling of Kink Effect in Polysilicon TFT
4HSVMeKi.abstract: Based on the physical mechanism of kink effect,two main approaches about kink current in polysilieon TFT are introduced.One is based on the charge sheet approach,the other is based on calculating a multiplication factor.Kink ef- fect means the obvious increasing of transconduetanee and drain current when devices are operating in the saturation re- gion.In digital circuits,the kink effect increases the power dissipation and degrades the switching characteristics;while, in analogue circuit applications,it reduces the maximum attainable gain as well as the common mode rejection ratio.In conclusion,the research of kink effect in polysilicon TFT has a significant meaning on the development of LCDs.

tFcIArgl.title: Research on Application of FCM and Rough Set Theory for Radar Signal Recognition
tFcIArgl.abstract: The discretization of continuous attributes is one of the most main problems in applying of rough set theory.For continuous data knowledge mining,FCM clustering is used to disperse continuous data to discrete variables for rough set to deal with and extract useful rules.This method which can get recognition information directly from original data can be applied to radar signal's sort recognition,and the simulation experiment and its results show that the recognition rules which come from this discretization method are effective and reliable to radar signal recognition.

xL8Deqtq.abstract: A method which applies the neural networks to regulate the parameter weight and the M-distance theory in recognizing radar signals is studied in this paper.It is demonstrated correct and effective by the computer simulation,and the experiment results are also analyzed and discussed.

TtIrpJgj.title: Fuzzy Recognition Method of Emitter Based on Variable Precision Rough Set Model
TtIrpJgj.abstract: In order to solve the problem of emitter recognition,the method of feature weights setting by using variable precision rough set model(VPRSM) is investigated.The description of object class' condition attribute in conception positive region is used to attain the plenary condition of this conception and the weights of feature parameters in emitter recognition are achieved by the dependences between knowledge.Simultaneously,the fuzzy theory is combined to form an emitter fuzzy recognition method based on feature weight by VPRSM.Finally,this method is applied in radar emitter recognition.Simulation results show that the method is feasible and effective.

gNuJhVH3.abstract: The significance degree of attribute and that to the decision attribute in incomplete information system are defined on the base of granularity and granularity computing,also a knowledge reduction algorithm for incomplete information system is introduced in this background.A study case of incomplete radar information system demonstrates the validity and practicability of this algorithm.and it supplies a good tool for processing incomplete radar information system.

2k5zUaXU.title: The Research on Applying Frequency Field Method to PRI's Feature Analysis of Radar Signal
2k5zUaXU.abstract: The value of PRI can be educed by TOA of radar signal,so the feature of PRI can be gained from the frequency field analysis results of TOA.The problem such as width setting in common histogram method can be overcome by frequency field method in PRI's feature analysis,and adding this method's own traits which make it have a merit not only in theory analysis but in practical application.The validity of this method is testified through simulation examples,and its performance under different circumstances is also analyzed.

osOGTHlR.title: A Radar Signal Recognition Algorithm based on Rough Sets and Fuzzy Support Vector Machine
osOGTHlR.abstract: A mixed algorithm based on attribute reduction of Rough Sets(RS) and classification principles of Support Vector Machine(SVM) is researched in this paper.Firstly,the attribute reduction of RS has been applied as preprocessor so that the redundant attributes,values and conflicting objects can be deleted from decision table but the efficient information remains lossless.For the unclassifiable regions existing in the problem of multiclass with SVM,fuzzy SVM is applied to settle this problem and be used in the succedent classification and forecast,which makes the training time reduced and classification performance enhanced greatly.The mixed method is used for radar signal recognition in this paper,simulation experiments and their results show this method is effective.

7ZUv5I7P.title: Recognition Method of Radar Signal Based on Rough Set and Support Vector Machine
7ZUv5I7P.abstract: A hybrid algorithm based on attributes reduction of rough set and classification principles of support vector machine (SVM) is presented in this paper. Firstly, the attributes reduction of rough set has been applied as preprocessor so that we can delete the redundant attributes and conflicting objects from decision making table but remain efficient information lossless. Then, the classification modeling and forecasting test based on SVM are realized. By this method, the dimension of data is reduced greatly, the complexity in the process of SVM classification is decreased highly, the occupied memory is cut down and the over-fit of training model is prevented at some extent, also the good classification performance is obtained. Finally, the simulation experiment of radar signal recognition and its results show this hybrid method is effective.

kBe6zXM5.title: Quantum chemistry study of the PAMAM dendrimer
kBe6zXM5.abstract: The molecular structure of EDA-cored 1.0G polyamidoamine(PAMAM) was fully geometrical optimized using the density functional theory(DFT) B3LYP method,as well as Hartree-Fock method at both 3-21G and 6-31G~* level.The results obtained at various levels were discussed and compared with each other and with the available experimental datas.It was shown that the calculations performed at B3LYP/6-31G~* level could produce more reliable results.The results derived at B3LYP/6-31G~* level were studied.The steady conformation was not entirely symmetrical,and the four branches were basically on the same plane.The primary amine,tertiary and secondary amine brought about by the decreasing number of negative charge,and the highest occupied molecular orbital concentrated on the nuclear.

boXVdkVD.title: Theoretical study on the free radical scavenging of lipoic acid analogues
boXVdkVD.abstract: In order to discover effective antioxidants,a systematic quantum chemistry study at density functional level was conducted on 16 lipoic acid analogues varied in total carbon numbers,nature of atoms X,Y and ring size.The X-Y bond dissociation enthalpy(BDE)and ionization potential(IP)were selected as theoretical indexes to evaluate the ability of free radical scavenging.The results showed that,those factors had different influence on BDE and IP.The nature of atoms X and Y had greater impact on the antioxidant activity than other factors.The selenium derivatives of lipoic acid were the candidates for new antioxidants.The HOMO energy gave the same antioxidant activity subsequence as indicated by IP value.The results showed a clear relationship between structure-antioxidant activity relationship,which was useful for the designing and synthesis of new antioxidants.

9djnE1g3.title: Study on Degradation of Wastewater Containing Phenol with Three-dimensional Electrode Reactor
9djnE1g3.abstract: The simulated wastewater containing phenol was degraded with a three-dimensional electrode reactor,and the electrode reactor was formed by particles of activated carbon through adsorption.The results showed,when the bath voltage was 10 V,the distance between the main electrodes was 6 cm,initial pH was 6.5,the concentration of the supporting electrolyte was 3 g/L,and the simulated wastewater with the initial concentration 300 mg/L was treated above 30 minutes,the degradation rate of phenol reached 84.21 %.If the electrode reactor was made up of activated carbon loaded with SnO2 by calcinations in 873 K,then the catalyzing degradation rate of phenol could increase by 10 % further.

rvZtvvxk.title: DFT study on 1,3,5,7-tetrahydrogen-1,3,5,7-tetramethylcyclotetrasiloxane
rvZtvvxk.abstract: B3LYP/6-311++G(d,p) was conducted on 1,3,5,7-tetrahydrogen-1,3,5,7-tetramethylcyclotetrasiloxane, including geometry conformation, electronic structures, dipole and frontier orbitals. The results showed that a "chair-boat" conformation was preferred. The positive charge located on Si and the negative charge located on O, C. There was no obvious difference between atoms concerning their contribution to the HOMO and LUMO. The large gap between HOMO and LUMO indicated the stability of title compound. With the increase of the polarity of solvent, stability of title compound increased.

DUfqwuxa.title: Theoretical study on antioxidant activity of lipoic acid-solvent effect
DUfqwuxa.abstract: Antioxidant activity of lipoic acid in heptane,benzene,dichloromethane,alcohol,DMSO and water was studied by SCRFOnsager model using DFT method.The S-S bond dissociation enthalpy(BDE)and the ionization potential(IP)were selected as theoretical index to evaluate the ability of free radical scavenging.The result showed that with the increasing of ionization potential of solvent,BDE remained almost unchanged,while IP decreased rapidly.Solvent effect had greater impact on the electron transfer mechanism.The antioxidant mechanism of lipoic acid preferred to the sulfur radical reaction when the polarity of the solvent decreased and it preferred to the electron transfer mechanism when the polarity of the solvent increased.

IqoWirHz.title: Theoretical studies on sodium dodecyl sulfonate of solvent effect
IqoWirHz.abstract: The preliminary conformations of sodium dodecyl sulfonate has been fully geometrical optimized,calculated by frequency and analyzed with NBO using self consistent renction field(SCRF) at HF(Hartree-Fock)/lanl2dz level in the solvent of benzene,ethanol, and water.The molecular geometrical conformations,electronic distributions and energy properties are explored.It is found that the main negative charges are concentrated on the oxygen atoms,negative electronics distributing tends to spread around according to the quantities increasing from 0.121 84 in gas to 0.012 14 in water.The greater the solvent polarity is,the more dispersed electron cloud distributes and the stronger the surfactant is.The dipole moment increased from 7.346 50 Debye in gas to 11.157 40 Debye in water. The increased energy form 0.000 47 a.u.in gas to 0.053 67 a.u.in water resulted in the depressed energy of sodium dodecyl sulfon- ate increasing when transited.Therefore,the conformation in water is more stable.

MeO1X6H8.title: A Study on Chinese Biodiversity Administration System
MeO1X6H8.abstract: Biodiversity administration system was a key factor influencing biodiversity conservation and management efficiency,which reflected a nation's awareness level of biodiversity issues to some extent.At present,the national biodiversity monitoring capacity was behind,and the administration system needed reforming urgently.Based on the status of the biodiversity administration system in China,the main existing problems were analyzed.Refering the advanced experience from other countries in the world,a conception to improve the biodiversity supervision system construction was put forward from the legislation,regulators construction,talent team construction,chemical technology,technical equipment investment and resource development,etc.

m9mWwOxR.title: DFT study on dimethyl benzoylphosphonate and its derivatives
m9mWwOxR.abstract: A DFT study using B3LYP/6-311G(d,p)was conducted on dimethyl benzoylphosphonate and its derivatives,including geometry conformation,electronic structures,dipole moment,and frontier orbitals.The results showed that those compounds preferred a trans-conformation of CO,and PO,and a conjugation system was formed between the benzene ring and CO.Compared to the neutral compounds,the ionic species exhibit a noticeable difference in terms of the atomic charges and dipole moments.The high dipole moments of ionic species are due to the high negative charge of oxygen atoms.

FHNzEQbM.title: Theoretical study of "structure-antioxidant" relationship of lipoic acid
FHNzEQbM.abstract: A DFT method was conducted on lipoic acid to study the "structure-antioxidant" relationship using bond dissociation enthalpy(EBD) and ionization potential(EIP) as evaluation indicator.The results showed that EBD and EIP was lower than that of VC,VE and gallic acid.By analyzing the results of the geometry conformation,electronic structures and frontier orbitals,it was found that the double-sulfur-five ring with high electron density was the active center of lipoic acid,which could coordinate with mental iron.The long S—S bond and the low EBD and EIP helped form free radical to show antioxidant activity.The carboxyl with high electron density could coordinate with mental iron too,and regulate the solubility of the title compound.

inGbvimS.title: Temperature distribution of the air flow field in melt blowing process: Simulation and measurement
inGbvimS.abstract: The melt blown nonwoven fabrics are characterized by superfine fiber structures. The key technology of achieving superfine fibers is the polymer drawing by the high velocity hot air jets. The temperature distribution of the air flow field has great influence on the polymer drawing. In this paper, the air temperature distribution of the dual slot die on an HDF-6D melt blowing nonwoven equipment is simulated and measured. The air flow field model of the dual slot die is established and solved numerically using the finite volume method and SIMPLE algorithm. The air temperature is measured with a temperature measuring system built for this research. Experimental results show that the simulation results of the air temperature coincide with the measured data which indicates the air flow flied model is effective. As this research is performed on an industrial melt blowing equipment, the results have great application values for actual production of melt blowing. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

YqiyXQKd.title: Development Status-quo of Spunbond Technology
YqiyXQKd.abstract: In recent years, spunbond technology has been taking a leading role in nonwoven industry due to its short process, high production efficiency and superior product properties. The development status quo of spunbond technology was introduced in this paper, in terms of raw material used, technique and equipment. Furthermore, the gaps between domestic spunbond technology and advanced technology overseas were also discussed.

yXWeAtJp.title: An Analysis on Application of Rotor Spinning Technology in Wool Sector
yXWeAtJp.abstract: In this paper, the development and present status of the application of rotor spinning technology in wool sector at home and abroad are outlined; the existing rotor-spun wool yarn are introduced; the adaptability of rotor spinning technology to the raw materials of wool spinning is analyzed; and some advices are given on using rotor spinning technology in wool sector.

JMAdgqpI.title: Numerical study on the polymer drawing of the unsymmetrical air flow field in melt blowing process
JMAdgqpI.abstract: Melt blowing is a typical nonwoven process for producing superfine fibers. In this process, the high velocity hot air jets attenuate the polymer melt into superfine fibers. Therefore, the fiber diameter is strongly affected by the air flow field. Dual slot die is one of the widely used melt blowing dies. Hot air emits from the two slots symmetrically. What will happen to the polymer drawing if the air jets are unsymmetrical? In this paper, the unsymmetrical air flow field of the dual slot die in melt blowing process is simulated numerically. The distributions of air velocity and air temperature are obtained. The polymer drawing model is then solved with the aid of the simulation results of air velocity and air temperature. The diameter and transverse displacement of the threadline along the spinline is achieved. The result shows that the threadline diameter of unsymmetrical air flow field is larger than that of the symmetrical air flow field and the threadline tends to deflect because of the unsymmetrical air jets. This paper helps to indicate the research direction for further decreasing the fiber diameter of melt blown nonwoven fabrics. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

XowofImR.title: An Input Variable Selection Method for the Artificial Neural Network of Shear Stiffness of Worsted Fabrics
XowofImR.abstract: The relationship between yarn properties, fabric parameters, and shear stiffness of worsted fabrics is modeled using the soft computing technique. Because of the small number of samples, the artificial neural network model to be established must be a small-scale one. Therefore, this soft computing approach includes two stages. First, the yarn properties and fabric parameters are selected by utilizing an input variable selection method, so as to find the most relevant yarn properties and fabric parameters as the input variables to fit the small-scale artificial neural network model. The first part of this method takes the human knowledge on the shear stiffness of fabrics into account. The second part utilizes a data sensitivity criterion based on a distance method. Second, the artificial neural network model of the relationship between yarn properties, fabric parameters, and shear stiffness of fabrics is established. The results show that the artificial neural network model yields accurate prediction and a reasonably good artificial neural network model can be achieved with relatively few data points by integrating with the input variable selecting method developed in this research. The results also show that there is great potential for this research in the field of computer-assisted design in textile technology. Copyright © 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. g35V5KPd.title: New Evolution of Spunlacing Technology - Composite Technology
g35V5KPd.abstract: Recently, spunlacing technology has made further progress in terms of raw material variety, process and equipment. Efforts have been made to introducing novel natural fibers, micro fibers and differential fibers into spunlaced nonwoven production, while spunlacing technology is adopted in the process for making nonwoven composites. This has enlarged the product range and opened wider application field for spunlaced nonwovens beyond the traditional medical and artificial leather applications. The method for making nonwoven composites based on spunlacing technology is described in this paper: layers formed by different web forming methods are bonded together by spunlacing technology. The properties of the resultant nonwoven composites are also introduced, which show the potential of spunlacing technology.

dCmceWkD.title: Measurement of the Diameter of Non-Woven Fiber Based on Image Processing
dCmceWkD.abstract: A series of images of single nonwoven fiber were captured with a CCD camera by using transmitted light,and then the medium filter was adopted to remove noise.The profile lines of the fiber were extracted by the Canny edge detection algorithm,then the obliquity of the fiber was gotten by curve fit.The diameter of the fiber was obtained according to the relationship of the obliquity and the horizontal or vertical length of the fiber.The diameter distribution of nonwoven fibers was analyzed preliminarily.

Y42QzbSB.title: Measurement of Fiber Orientation Distribution of Nonwoven Fabrics Based on Image Processing
Y42QzbSB.abstract: The orientation of the holes' edge profiles among fibers in the image was extracted to measure the fiber orientation distribution of nonwoven fabrics. Firstly, the image of the nonwoven web was captured, and the noises on image were removed by medium filter. Then the image of nonwoven web was turned into a binary image by a threshold, and the holes in the fiber were filled by operation of mathematical morphology. The sub images of the holes among fibers were labeled sequentially. Finally, the obliquity of the fiber was calculated based on the edge direction of each hole, and the orientation distribution of the fibers was obtained.

MAvtmZme.title: Optimum design for the dual slot die parameters of melt blowing process
MAvtmZme.abstract: Melt blowing process can produce superfine fibers. In this process, the polymer is drawn by the high velocity hot air jets from the dual slot die. The die parameters have great effects on the fiber diameter. In this paper, the die parameters of the dual slot die in an industrial melt blowing equipment are studied using the orthogonal experimental design method. Three parameters namely the inset distance, slot width and slot angle are considered. Each parameter has three levels. Nine sizes of dual slot dies with different design parameters are numerically simulated using the established air flow field model of melt blowing process. Distributions of air velocity and air temperature of nine air jet flow fields are obtained. Effects of the three parameters are studied with range analysis and variance analysis. The results show that the inset distance and slot width have significant effects on the air flow field while effect of the slot angle is unremarkable. Finally the optimal die parameters are obtained. The results lay the theoretical foundation for further studies on the computer assisted design for the dual slot die in the melt blowing process. © (2013) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland.

wYzW3TEm.abstract: Recently,image process technique is widely used in nonwoven industry.The development status quo of image processing technique in measuring some characteristic of nonwovens such as fiber orientation distribution,fiber diameter,web uniformity and defects of nonwovens was introduced in this paper.Furthermore,the developing trends were put forward.

euApGuLr.title: Effect of Inclined Water Jets on Tensile Strength of Bicomponent Hydroentangled Nonwoven Fabrics
euApGuLr.abstract: The effects of inclined water jets on bicomponent hydroentangled fabrics were investigated.The PET/COPET and PA6/PET hydroentangled fabrics were made by using designed inclined water jet apparatus.Effects of basis weight,water jets inclination angle and water jet pressure were discussed.The comparison was made on the average tensile strength of fabrics made by perpendicular water jets (0°inclination angle) and inclined water jets of 20°with pressure levels of 3 bars and 7 bars.It was found that increases of water jet pressure,the fabrics tensile strength were increased.Furthermore,increases of water jets inclination angle,fabric tensile strength of 60 g/m~2 fabrics decreased while for 100 g/m~2 fabrics tensile strength increased.

Mw6qJFnk.title: Study on the air flow field of the drawing conduit in the spunbonding process
Mw6qJFnk.abstract: The air flow field of the drawing conduit in the spunbonding process has a   great effect on the polymer drawing, the filament diameter and orientation.   A  simulation of the process is carried out, and the results are   compared with the experimental data, showing good accuracy of the numerical   prediction. This research lays an important foundation for the optimal   design of the drawing conduit in the spunbonding process.

t9zGHx7h.title: EFFECTS OF THE CONDUIT GEOMETRY ON THE AIR FLOW FIELD IN THE SPUNBONDING PROCESS
t9zGHx7h.abstract: In  spunbonding process,  air flow field   drawing conduit affects    polymer drawing and therefore  filament diameter greatly. Effects of    conduit parameters on  air flow field are studied using  previously   established air flow field model. The results show that longer    section, longer contracting section and larger height  narrow entry are of   benefit to increasing  air velocity, thus helpful for decreasing the   filament diameter.

eTT4XEgR.title: HPLC determination of luteolin and apigenin in rat bile and its application
eTT4XEgR.abstract: Objective: To establish a RP-HPLC method for the determination of luteolin and apigenin in rat bile, and study the biliary excretion of luteolin and apigenin after rat orally administrated Chrysanthemum morifolium extract (CME). Methods:Bile samples were enzymatic hydrolyzed before analysis by RP-HPLC. SB-C_(18) HPLC column (250 mm×4.6mm, 5μm)was used. The mobile phase was methanol-0.2% phosphoric acid (52:48,v/v) with the flow rate of 1.0mL·min~(-1); the UV detector was set at 350 nm. Results:A good separation was obtained. The standard curves for luteolin and apigenin in bile were linear over the range of 0.1745-6.986μg·mL~(-1) and 0.3693-11.08μg·mL~(-1), respectively. The absolute recovery for luteolin and apigenin was 84.6% to 106.2% and assay recovery was 80.1% to 106.9%. The intra -and inter -day precisions (RSD) for luteolin and apigenin were all less than 14%. The relative biliary excretion rate of intake dose Of luteolin and apigenin during 36 hours after oral administration were 2.05% and 6.34%, respectively. Conclusion:The method developed is accurate, sensitive for the determination of luteolin and apigenin in bile. Enterohepatic circulation of luteolin and apigenin associated with double peaks in the blood concentration-time curves can be proved by the biliary excretion.

cOlYrqIL.title: Preparation and evaluation quality of seratrodast oral disintergrating tablets
cOlYrqIL.abstract: Objective To prepare seratrodast oral disintegrating tablets and evaluate its quality. Methods Microcrystalline cellulose and lactose were used as main adjuvants. The formulation was optimized with disintegration time as a reference parameter by an orthogonal design. And the oral disintegrating tablets was prepared by direct powder compressing method.The UV was adopted to determine seratrodast content.The disintegration time, taste and dissolution rate were also assessed. Results The optimal excipients for1 000 tablets were composed of seratrodast 40 g, microcrystalline cellulose 40 g, lactose 10 g, mannitol 15 g,croscarmellose sodium 5 g, steviosin 3 g, menthol 1 g and aerosil 0.5 g. The tablets disintegrated completely within 30 s. The average recovery and RSD of seratrodast was 99.8% and 0.9%, respectively.Conclusion The oral disintegrating tablets can be used as industrial product and clinical preparation.

J0p71CGv.title: Determination of bis (p-fluorobenzyl) trisulfide and bis (p-fluoro-benzyl) disulfide in lungs of rat by HPLC]
J0p71CGv.abstract: To establish an HPLC method for analysis of bis(p-fluorobenzyl) trisulfide(BFTS) and bis(p-fluorobenzyl)disulfide(BFDS) in the lungs of rat.5.0 ml extract solvent (n-hexane: isopropyl alcohol=95:5, v/v) and 20 microl of 11.50 microg/ml dibenzyl disulfide (internal standard) were added to 0.2 g lung sample followed by homogenization. After centrifugation, 4.0 ml of supernatant was separated and vaporized to dryness, and the residue was reconstituted in mobile phase for HPLC analysis. The HPLC analysis was performed on an SB C18 column using acetonitrile and water (65:35, v/v) as mobile phase with a flow rate of 1.0 ml/min with UV detection at 220 nm.The calibration curves for BFTS and BFDS in sample were linear over the concentration ranges of 0.04712-14.78 microg/g(r=0.999) and 0.04831-23.96 microg/g(r=0.999), respectively. The limits of quantification were 0.04712 microg/g and 0.04831 microg/g for BFTS and BFDS, respectively. The assay recoveries for BFTS and BFDS ranged from 95.71%-107.2% and 90.00%-110.5%, respectively. The precisions were obtained with RSD of <10%. The developed method was successfully applied to study the content of BFTS and BFDS in the lungs of rats after intravenous injection of 12.5 mg/kg BFTS.The method developed is simple, selective, repeatable and accurate, which can be applied to study the tissue distribution of BFTS and BFDS.

xbagrFyi.title: Pharmacokinetics of active component of Chrysanthemum morifolium extracts and its acid hydrolysate in rabbits
xbagrFyi.abstract: OBJECTIVE: To characterize and compare the metabolic pharmacokinetics of the active components (luteolin and apigenin) in rabbit after an oral administration of acid hydrolysate of Chrysanthemum morifolium extracts (CME) or intact CME, and clarify whether the bioavailability of flavoloids from Chrysanthemum morifolium, Ramat. would be modified due to the preparation of flavonoids forms. METHODS: The concentrations of luteolin and apigenin in plasma were determined by HPLC method after a single oral dose of 200 mg·kg -1 of intact CME and hydrolysate of CME was administered to rabbits. The pharmacokinetic parameters were calculated by software 3P87 and statistical analysis was performed by software Microsoft Excel. RESULTS: The plasma concentration of luteolin was determined accurately and the pharmacokinetic profile was discribed by an one-compartment model. However, the present study showed that the concentration of apigenin was too low to be measured accurately. There were some differences in pharmacokinetic parameters for active component (luteolin) between the hydrolysate of CME and intact CME apparently. Furthermore, the oral hydrolysate of CME resulted in a delayed t max, lower ρ max and longer MRT (mean residence time) for luteolin than those after an oral dose of intact CME. CONCLUSION: By statistical analysis, the bioavailability of luteolin reveals no significant difference (P > 0.05) after an oral administration of acid hydrolysate of CME or intact CME to rabbit.

IllQz7uf.title: Preparation and characterization of rutin submicron emulsion
IllQz7uf.abstract: Objective To optimize the formulation and preparation procedure of rutin submicron emulsion for injection and investigate its physico-chemical properties and hemolysis potential. Methods Orthogonal experiment was designed to optimize the formulation of rutin submicron emulsion. The content and entrapment efficiency of the preparation were determined by HPLC, and its properties such as particle size, zeta potential and hemolysis were studied. Results The optimized formulation was composed of rutin 2 g·L-1, oil phase 100 g·L-1 with MCT-LCT (m:m=1:1), SPC 18 g·L-1 , Poloxamer F-68 8 g·L-1 , sodium oleate 5 g·L-1, vitamin E 4 g·L-1, and glycerin 22.5 g·L-1. Homogenizing the sample for 6 times at 100 MPa at room temperature was optimal. Both drug content and mean entrapment efficiency of rutin submicron emulsions were above 90.0 % , with the pH value between 5 and 6, mean particle size of 143 nm, and ζ potential of -27.4 mV Conclusion By using this optimized formulation and preparation technique, stable rutin submicron emulsion can be obtained without hemolysis.

6boDt1oF.title: Studies on the intestinal absorption kinetics of mycophenolatemofetil in rats
6boDt1oF.abstract: Objective:To study the absorptivecharacters of MMF and MPAin rats' intestines.Methods:An in situ intestinal perfusion model was employed to investigate systemically the absorptive characterof MMF and MPA.The effects of pH value,absorption site and drug concentration on drug absorption were studied.Results:The absorption rate constant(Ka)of MMF were 0.0176,0.0219,0.0311,0.0333 h-1 at duodenum,jejunum,ileum,and colon respectively(P<0.05).Within the range of 5.4-7.4,pH value had no influence on absorption of drug.The Ka of MMF were 0.0964,0.1325,0.1655,0.1222 h-1 at the concentration of 65,135,200,300 μg·mL-1 while the Ka of MPA were kept unvaried basically.Conclusion:MMFwere absorbed at all the segment of intestine in rats.It was suggested that MMF could be designed as sustained-release dosage form.

f0fXQ3lg.title: HPLC determination of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride in compound xylazine injection
f0fXQ3lg.abstract: Objective:To determine the content of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride in compound xylazine injection by HPLC.Methods:The C18(250 mm×4.6 mm,5 μm) column was used;the mobile phase was methanol-acetonitrile-0.02 mol·L-1 potassium dihydrogen phosphate(20:7:73),pH was adjusted to 3.8-4.0 by H3PO4;the flow rate was 1.0 mL·min-1,the wavelength used for detection was 286 nm.Results:The linear range of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride was 10-30 μg·mL-1(r=0.9995);the average recoveries(n=3) of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride were 98.8%,99.8% and 99.3%,and their RSDs were 0.64%,0.87% and 0.48%,respectively;RSD of between-day and within-day were 0.64%-0.89% and 0.60%-0.92%,separately.Conclusion:A convenient,rapid,and effective method has been provided for determining the content of dihydroetorphine hydrochloride in compound xylazine injection.

Rm04FPQ9.title: Preparation and quality control of vitamin compound for injection
Rm04FPQ9.abstract: Objective:To study preparation and stability of vitamin compound for injection.Methods:The formula and preparation of vitamin compound for injection were optimized based on the contents and pH environment.Stabilities of 3 batches of the vitamin compound were investigated.Results:The optimal formula was consisted of Vitamin A palmitate,VitaminD2,Vitamin E,Vitamin K1 and appropriate excipients.The 3 batches of the samples in the commercial package were stable in the accelerated,room temperature storage tests.Conclusion:The optimal formula of vitamin compound for injection was achievable.

HV9uqQr3.title: Preparation of 5-fluorouracil PLGA nanoparticles
HV9uqQr3.abstract: 5-fluorouracil nanoparticles were obtained by W/O/W-liquid drying process using biodegradable materialspoly(L-lactic-co-glycolic acid)(PLGA).In order to reach submicron size,a high pressure homogenizer to obtain nanoparticles with a high grade of monodispersity was used.The orthogonal test design was used to optimize the conditions of preparation.The shape of the nanoparticles was observed by TEM.The mean diameter and the particle size distribution of nanoparticles,the encapsulation efficiency,the drug loading,the reappearances of pharmaceutical technology were investigated.The results indicated that 5-fluorouracil PLGA nanoparticles were sphere like with the mean size of 85.4 nm,the drug loading was(12.4±0.7)%,the encapsulation efficiency of nanoparticles was(64.1±5.3)%.

EPwqRHFh.title: Analysis of the Internal Employment Structure of Service Industry in Shaanxi Province
EPwqRHFh.abstract: Based on the standard industry classification data and using Shift share Method,this paper studies the internal structure and competitiveness of the service industries in Shaanxi Province. The results show that the overall development of service industry in Shaanxi Province is faster than the national average,but some departments ( Finance etc. ) are slower than corresponding departments in China. The industrial mix effect indicates that all the departments are of high degree of structural optimization and are conductive to regional economic growth. However,the weak competitiveness of some department ( Wholesale & Retail etc. ) impacts the overall strength of these departments,and also highly constrains development of Shaanxi service industry. So these would be the focuses for the future reform and adjustment.

904kgeN1.title: Analysis on the Self-reliance Effect of Services and Influencing Factors:A Case Shanxi of Shanxi Province
904kgeN1.abstract: The paper constructs an analysis model to explore the self-reliance effect on the basis of Input-output Analysis. The model distinguishes and compares the self-reliance effect of services and the demand relationship between the manufacturing and services. And it analyses influencing factors about the self-reliance effect of services by using Structural Decomposition Analysis (SDA). The Empirical Research in Shanxi Province suggests that the services has a strong self-reliance effect, however industries division is still in the primary level. So promoting the producer service to be more external and specialized is the key to develop services.

RbT3fGGx.title: An Empirical Analysis on the Antecedents of Internet Customer Behavior
RbT3fGGx.abstract: Maintaining loyal Internet customer is an important determinant for profit improving and continual development of e-business enterprises.Investigating the antecedents for internet customers loyalty and the way they interact is the key(to maintaining) customers.In this paper,we investigate the antecedents of internet customers' repurchasing intention and actual repurchasing behavior,on the basis of Planned Behavior Theory.An Internet customer loyalty model,integrating(e-service) quality,customer satisfaction,emotion relationship,and switching barriers,is established.Then hypotheses are raised and the tested using structural equation modeling.It was found that customers' repurchasing intention is the unique direct determinant for their behavior;and repurchasing intent mediates the influence from satisfaction,emotion relationship on their behavior.Customers' experience with website,service reliability,safety and privacy,and customer service have(indirect) influence on repurchasing intention via satisfaction.

mdaF5P4w.abstract: By employing the input-output method,this paper emphasizes the industrial linkage between equipment manufacturing and services.The results show that equipment manufacturing and producer services have the significant industry linkage effect on themselves and other industries and consumer services have got increased effect.

VRdPvqas.title: The Analysis of International R&D Spillover and Productivity Growth Path of Manufacturing Based on Panel Data
VRdPvqas.abstract: In order to test the impact of industries' own scientific and technological level on their international R&D spillovers and productivity growth path,according to the sector's average R&D investment density from 1999 to 2004,the paper divides Chinese manufacturing into high,medium and low-tech industry.Then based on DEA,the tfpch,effch,techch of the industries have been measured.Finally,the paper empirically tests the domestic foreign R&D capital of industry itself and other industry R&D capital's impact on three different manufacturing productivity.The result shows that foreign R&D capital has significant positive spillover to high-tech industry,while industries themselves R&D activity is the main source of medium and low-tech industry's productivity growth.Based on above analysis,some advice has been made for our country's industrial R&D investment and international trade policy.

tPzH9nIR.title: A Customer Value-oriented Service Failure Decision Model
tPzH9nIR.abstract: This study focused on the decision mechanism design of corporate optimal recovery strategies based on corporate cost control.First,it proposes a conceptual framework of service failure and service recovery system based on customer value perception.Then it constructs an optimization model of corporate service recovery decision with the variables of procedure recovery input,result recovery input,and recovery time.Under the condition of satisfying the basic recovery demand of customers,corporate can design the cost-optimized recovery strategy with this model.

W2IXkhb2.title: Isolation,Identification and Pathogenicity Island Gene Detection of Salmonella in Commercial Eggs
W2IXkhb2.abstract: Objective: To monitor the Salmonella contamination status of commercial eggs,detect the pathogenesis and pathogenicity island(SPI) gene of Salmonella isolates and their correlation.Methods: Commercial eggs were collected from supermarkets in different cities in Shaanxi province.The eggshell membranes were harvested for isolating and culturing Salmonella in eggs.The strain isolates were identified through the PCR amplification of the special gene invA from Salmonella.The isolated strains were used for testing the pathogenesis for chicken.According to the sequence of SPI genes published in GenBank,PCR primers were designed to amplify and identify the SPI genes of core proteins.Results: A total of 30 Salmonella strains were isolated from 1100 commercial eggs that were purchased from 55 supermarkets.According to animal pathogenesis tests,13 strains were pathogenic and 7 strains were strongly pathogenic among these Salmonella strains.The carrying rate of SPI gene was 60% for SPI-1,73.3% for SPI-2,100% for SPI-3,90% for SPI-4 and 76.7% for SPI-5.Meanwhile,SPI-1 and SPI-2 revealed an obvious correlation with pathogenesis.Conclusion: The isolation rate of Salmonella from commercial eggs observed in this study is 2.73%.SPI-1 and SPI-2 have a positive correlation with pathogenesis.

HEtNL2JV.title: Expression and purification of Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins of Brucella abortus and their antigenicity research
HEtNL2JV.abstract: The research aims at obtaining Brucella abortus's Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins with high purity and biologic activity and analyzing their antigenicity.A polymerase chain reaction(PCR) method was used to amplify the Omp10 and Omp25 gene regions,which were ligated with pET-32α prokaryotic expression vector into pET-32α-Omp10/Omp25 recombinant plasmids.The recombinant plasmids were transformed into Escherichia coli BL21(DE3) PlysS whose expression was induced by IPTG and then separated and purified through HisTrap HP affinity column.The methods of Western-blot and indirect ELISA were used to detect the products' antigenicity.The results of gene sequencing and restriction enzyme digestion identification both proved that the pET-32α-Omp10/Omp25 vectors were successfully constructed.The SDS-PAGE electrophoresis showed that the Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins were both highly expressed in the form of inclusion bodies in E.coli.After the denaturation,renaturation and affinity chromatography of inclusion bodies,the recombinant proteins in size of 34 000 and 44 000 were successfully obtained,which correspond to the expected protein molecular weight.The detection of Western-blot and indirect ELISA proved that purified Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins could be identified by the Brucella positive serum from immunized cattle.The research showed that Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins of Brucella abortus were successfully obtained and they both had certain immunogenicity.Serological reaction was also confirmed that the Omp10 and Omp25 recombinant proteins laid the foundation for the development of Brucellosis clinical diagnostic reagent kits.

DmxzBPgz.title: Study on pathogenicity of H9N2 subtype avian influenza virus for oviduct of hens
DmxzBPgz.abstract: In order to observe H9N2 subtype influenza virus(H9N2 AIV)pathogenicity for oviduct of hens,the distribution of sialic acids α-2,3Gal receptor in oviduct of hens was investigated by using lectin histochemical staining;H9N2 AIV was inoculated to observe histopathological changes of oviduct;primary cells of oviduct magnum epithelial were cultured with collagenase I digestion,pathological changes were observed after inoculating H9N2 AIV.The result showed that SAα-2,3Gal receptors were expressed in chicken oviduct except infundibulum.Histopathological changes showed epithelial villus fell off or epithelial cell necrosis in magnum and broad hyperemia,hemorrhage in tissue of shell gland;primary cells show no obvious histopathological changes at 72 h after inoculated H9N2 AIV,but the viral titer achieved by 3log2.From the above results,H9N2 AIV can encroach on oviduct of hens,and cause histopathological changes.

SVKctqDB.title: Construction of Integrin Interference Vector and Its Transfection into Cells
SVKctqDB.abstract: This research was designed to use RNA interference,currently more advanced methods,to design and synthetize the integrin's shRNA vector at two different sites as well as the control vector.Then we transfected them into E.coli DH5α strain in order to get the adequate amount of the plasmid before transfecting them into pig umbilical vein endothelial cells.We detected the expression of the integrin using RT-PCR and the electrophoretogram showed that the interference vector was successfully constructed and transfected into mammalian cells.The interference effect was obvious at the mRNA level.This also lay the foundation for further research of integrin's role in proliferation of the CSFV.

RA4otDOx.title: A KAP Research on Urban Residents' Smoking Control Ability in Baoshan District in 2004-2006,Shanghai
RA4otDOx.abstract: Objective To get the knowledge of the dynamic change in community residents' smoking control ability in Baoshan District in order to provide the basis for the implementation of smoking control directly.Methods A questionnaire household survey was conducted among 3 366 residents by random sampling based on the general population of Baoshan District.Results There was a growth trend of smoking control knowledge in community residents from 2004 to 2006.Residents didn't change a lot towards the smoking control problem.Among them, the rate of approving banning cigarettes advertisement decreased significantly(P<0.05), while the rate of agreement to increase the price of cigarettes rose obviously(P<0.05).The smoking rate in man was 54.2%, which showed a significant increase in these three years.There was also a higher smoking rate among the people who have lower educational level.The smoking rate was the highest in the 30-49 years old and workers in terms of age and vocation.The heavy smoking rate of man was 37.4%, which mainly in the group of over 30 years old and low educational degree(P<0.05).Smoking-quitting rate was 19.5%.There was a growing trend with the ages.The passive smoking rate was 48.0%.Conclusion Smoking control in community is not optimistic.We should ensure the timely and effective implementation of Framework Convention on Tobacco Control so as to assure the smoking control work in terms of policy and measures.

pffVAh3m.title: Status Quo and Influencing Factors on Exercise of the Elderly in Community of Baoshan District,Shanghai
pffVAh3m.abstract: Objective To understand the current situation of physical exercise in the elderly in Baoshan District and explore factors that affect the exercise of the aged, so as to provide a basis for the development of physical exercise in the elderly. Methods Totally 1,188 elderly people were investigated by questionnaire. The exercise situation and its influencing factors were analyzed. Results The proportion of elderly people in sports population was 58.7%, and 47.3% actively taking part in exercise. Major sports event in the elderly was walk, accounting for 67.8%, Jogging, health exercises, fast walking and dancing accounted for 14.4%, 13.1%, 13.6% and 12.9% respectively. The motivation of participating in physical exercise of the elderly was mainly for exercise and diseases prevention, accounting for 90.0% and 43.6% respectively. The main reasons of the non-participating were no interest in sports and no time, accounting for 46.0% and 43.9%, while having no playground only account for 3.6%. The significant factors influencing exercise participation were profession, whether living with their children, whether working, time in doing daily housework, and satisfaction degree of their economic situation. Conclusion The level of exercise of the elderly in Baoshan District is growing. Physical exercise of the elderly should be organized and promoted in terms of communities, families and others.

g9LoQEMz.title: Analysis on dynamic change of life quality among community residents in Baoshan Distrtct of Shanghai City
g9LoQEMz.abstract: Objective To analyze the relationship between the dynamic change on residents life quality and health service status in Baoshan Distrtct of Shanghai.Methods To monitor the quality of life(QOL) of community residents together with the behavior risk factors.Results From 2007 to 2009,the QOL of downtown residents regarding body health,social relations and environment,declined respectively from 15.87±1.86,15.94±1.59,14.98±1.72 to 15.52±1.92,15.56±1.82,14.57±2.20(P<0.01).In conversely,the QOL of suburbs residents in the same aspect appears to have a rising tendency(P<0.01)that elevateed from 15.04±1.96 to 15.38±1.89,14.86±2.23 to 15.40±2.12 and 13.62±1.95 to 14.11±2.18(P<0.01).The percentage of emotional dissatisfaction had increased in downtown residents from 3.8% to 14.6%,while the rate of untreated patients from 1.0% to 4.9%(P<0.01).And health education receiving rate has decreased from 78.9% to 70.3%(P<0.01).In contrast,in suburbs individuals,in addition to the reduction of low salary population from 27.1% to 7.9%(P<0.01),the percentages of receiving annual medical examination,health education and biennial lipid screening in individuals over 40 years of age,appeared to increase from 31.4% to 44.7%,58.5% to 67.7%,and 46.7% to 59.8%(P<0.01).Conclusion The QOL always aligns with healthcare service in the community.And it can be helpful in evaluating the effects of community healthcare.

oPCUNwES.title: Health Needs and Realization of the Community Residents from the Perspective of Health Communication
oPCUNwES.abstract: Objective To understand community residents' health needs and realization,to provide a basis for the adjustment of health communication strategies.Methods By the random sampling,1,275 residents from 17 communities of Baoshan District were selected and investigated in terms of their needs for communicators,health information and transmission channels,realization,and evaluation.Results The top five needs of community residents for health information were self health care,the nutrition and food safety,the chronic disease cure and prevention,the infectious disease cure and prevention,the knowledge of sports,and the need rates were 68.5%,66.1%,56.9%,35.1% and 28.5% respectively.The sequence of the satisfaction degree of all kinds of information was consistent with that of needs basically,but there was a big gap between them.The top six of media channels were health TV programs,mobile TV,bulletin board,blackboard,internet,and text message.And the rates were 86.9%,75.2%,72.5%,67.9%,49.5% and 32.5% respectively.Residents' satisfaction degree of the interpersonal and group/organization communication was higher than that of mass communication(P<0.01).The main way of residents' getting health information were all kinds of mass media,health sectors and residential quarter.The health communicators whom residents took into their confidence ranked as medical workers,health-promoting volunteers and mass media personnel from high to low.Conclusion Community residents' health needs were far from satisfied.The advantages in wide coverage of mass media and high credibility of medical workers should be made full use of to strengthen the comprehensive health communication.

d15Frk7a.title: Investigation and analysis on the current situation of community health education in Baoshan District,Shanghai

FUfNu2G7.title: Analysis on dynamic monitoring of hypertensive behavioral risk factors in residents of Baoshan District,Shanghai
FUfNu2G7.abstract: Objective To analyze the dynamic monitoring state of hypertensive behavioral risk factors with the purpose of providing grounds and reference for the further work in this spectrum.Methods A total of 5635 locals who agreed to complete the follow-up survey relating to hypertension during the years of 2004 to 2008 participated in this study.Information on knowledge awareness,attitude and habits was collected.Results The awareness rate of normal blood pressure range,marginal hypertension standards,and harms of high-salt diet had been increasing significantly(P<0.01),except the awareness rate of normal blood pressure range among participants aged 40 or below(P>0.05).In the age group over 35,the acceptance rate of an annual examination test showed a tortuous elevation(P<0.05)and the population who took practical action to follow up the idea was also increasing steadily(P<0.01),among whom female more than male,old age less than others.Besides,the adoption rate of over-salty diet droped persistently within the past 30 days.However,hypertension-attack patients in all age group tended to take less initiatives on the control and therapy.The proportion of community residents who were accessible to health education expanded yearly.Conclusion These findings showed our previous work of health education and promotion underlie today's rewarding effect.The prospect of the intervention of hypertension is promising.Trainings on hypertension knowledge and attitudes,and monitoring service should be enhanced.

fl4Wfjys.title: Influence of Different Types of Health Literacy Questionnaires on Evaluation Outcomes
fl4Wfjys.abstract: Objective To evaluate the difficulty degree of the questions about health literacy knowledge and analyze the influece of different kinds of questions on the evaluation results. Methods 66 items of health literacy knowledge was selected as different kinds of questions, which composed 4 papers to reflect public knowledge level. The difference of knowledge rates among various types of questions was analyzed. Results There were significant differences among all 12 groups of different types of questions with the same content (P < 0.05). The correct rate of truth-descriptive questions in 10 groups was higher than that of false-descriptive questions. 6 groups had no statistic significance (P > 0.05) among the 7 groups of true-false questions containing the same type and content. In addition, 7 groups among the 10 groups with true-false and multiple-choice questions showed significant difference (P < 0.01), while the correct rate of truth-descriptive questions was higher than that of multiple-choice questions. Conclusion Various types of questions have a great impact on evaluation outcomes of health ecudation. A standard and scientific question bank should be established to improve the objectivity of health education evaluation by further research.

uhDMz922.title: School health education status in Baoshan District of Shanghai City
uhDMz922.abstract: Objective To investigate the implementation of health education(HE) activities among schools in Baoshan District,Shanghai City,and provide evidence for plan and effect evaluation in future.Methods By using stratified systematic sampling method,totally 30 schools in different kinds were sampled from over 140 schools in Baoshan District.Schools HE status were investigated. Results The number of teachers who had received medical training was 17 among 291 teachers of HE in all schools,accounting for 5.8%.19 of 29 psychological teachers had professional qualifications,accounting for 65.5%.The chief HE propaganda were blackboards and posters.There were 79 posters in all schools,averaged 2.63 per school,and 144 blackboards in all schools,averaged 4.8 per school.Most HE contents and activities were associated to "other category","healthy lifestyles" and "chronic disease prevention".The lessons time in vocational and technical schools were highest,the number of health activities in primary schools was largest,the popular teaching methods were regular classes and broadcasts,accounting for 60.0%.The HE teachers were psychology teacher or teacher in charge of class.Necessary regulations such as "tobacco control","cafeteria sanitation" were basically established and implemented.Basic school health services kept in high-quality,the management rate of student physical examination was 100%.Psychological services in 12 schools remained in a low degree of utilization,service number in 7 school was 0,accounting for 23.3%. Conclusion Although school HE in Baoshan District has basically met the work requirements,it should be further consolidated and improved in some weak items.

3SZq81L7.title: Survey and Analysis on Knowledge, Attitude and Practice Status Quo of Balanced Nutrition among Residents in Baoshan District
3SZq81L7.abstract: Objective To investigate KAP on balanced nutrition among residents in Baoshan district, as well as the sources they got information to provide evidence for health education on balanced nutrition. Methods 1 458 residents were selected by random sampling and investigated with the questionnaire on KAP. Results The overall knowledge rate of balanced nutrition accounts for 65.7% among residents, while that of Dietary Guide for Chinese Residents was 73.3% and that of Chinese Balanced diet Guideline was 46.5% respectively. Such results were influenced by education, age and job of the residents (P<0.01).The accuracy rates of all the answers were universally lower than 50%, except that the rate of right habit for cooking vegetables was up to 92.6%. Indeed, the research indicates that a long distance between Chinese Balanced Diet Guideline and residents’ food style that they favored. And they mainly obtained the nutrition knowledge from TV and radio broadcasting, bulletin boards, blackboards and copies in public places. Conclusion We should adopt integrated strategy to enhance health education and health promotion on nutrition, and improve the knowledge and habit of balanced nutrition among residents in Baoshan district at large.

poduaKcq.title: Analysis of Community Health Counseling Spot Status in Baoshan District,Shanghai
poduaKcq.abstract: Objective Learn the status and problems of community health counseling spot in Baoshan District of Shanghai in order to provide evidence for counseling spot development. Methods A questionnaire survey was carried out on basic situation of counseling spot and the need of consultants, residents and respondents to counseling service. Results More than 91.8% counseling spots reached the standards. The area of 64.5% counseling spot is about ten to twenty square meters. There were about ten persons to seek counseling health every time in 68.2% counseling spots. 70.0% residents and 79.1% respondents thought that the counseling is important. However, only 39.7% consultants thought that residents paid more attention to consultation. Residents hoped to receive health service and respondents hoped to receive disease prevention and control guidance. Consultants wanted to be trained on health behavior, mental health care, chronic disease prevention and control. In face of difficulties, doctors were lack of time and health promotion volunteers were lack of techniques. Consultants suggested improving counseling condition, increasing free materials and organizing well, while respondents suggested increasing free materials, improving counseling condition and advancing counsel level. Conclusion Community health counseling spot is welcomed by residents. However, only further understanding, perfect system, policy support and technical ability can develop community health counseling spot.

1WKsmpce.title: Effect assessment of salt intake reduction intervention among residents in Baoshan District,Shanghai
1WKsmpce.abstract: Objective To assess the effect of the intervention on the residents' salt intake reduction in Baoshan District,Shanghai,and to provide evidence for further salt intake interventions.Methods Investigators distributed the salt control spoons to the residents.A sample of 160 families were assessed pre-intervention,and six months,one year,and two years after the interventions on the daily salt consumption and knowledge,belief,and practice of salt intake(KABP).Results Two years after the interventions,the average awareness rate of four knowledge items about the relations between slat and health had risen from 58.5% to 79.2%.The average of three salt control acceptance rates had increased from 72.2% to 77.4%.The percent of those who persuaded other family members to use less salt when cooking had increased from 60.7% to 68.4%.All the presented improvements were statistically significant(P<0.05),but followed a curvilinear pattern of increase in the first year and minor decrease in the second year.Residents' daily salt consumptions per capita were 8.00 g,7.94 g,7.41 g,and 7.78 g,respectively,at four measurement times(P>0.05).In the total amount of salt intake,daily invisible salt intake per person could reach 1.65 g;only 3.7% of the enrolled families had low sodium salt.Conclusion The salt control intervention had showed effects on KABP,but not on daily salt intake.The salt control intervention should be further strengthened,and low sodium salt use should be also promoted.

rKNMxm8i.title: Analysis on health literacy among administration staffs in Baoshan Distict of Shanghai
rKNMxm8i.abstract: Objective To understand health literacy status among administration staffs,and analyze influencing factors in Baoshan District of Shanghai City.Methods 215 government official administration staffs were investigated in Baoshan District and Chinese Citizens' Health Literacy Questionnaire(2010 Edition)was used.Results 15.80% of the staffs had satisfied health literacy,of which 18.60% had satisfied knowledge literacy,13.10% with satisfied behavior literacy,59.10% with satisfied skills literacy.Analysis of variance revealed that there was no statistical significance between gender and marriage status.Scores of skills literacy showed statistical different in age(F=6.29,P=0.01),and score of group aged above 50 years old was the lowest(9.09±2.72).There was no difference among knowledge,behaviors and overall health literacy.Scores of skills literacy showed no statistical significance in cultural classification(F=5.41,P=0.01),and the highest score was in college group(10.32±1.90).Scores of knowledge,behavior and overall health literacy showed statistical significant among classifications of incoming.In group incoming above RMB 10 000,their scores of knowledge and behavior were the highest[(37.86±6.38) and(24.06±3.66),respectively].Scores of skill literacy had no statistical significance.Conclusion Administration staff's health literacy in Baoshan District is low.Health literacy levels are associated with different social characteristics.It is necessary to develop targeted effective measurements to improve health literacy among administration staffs.

nAmDsH8s.title: Life Quality Evaluation among the Middle-aged and Elderly Residents in Baoshan District
nAmDsH8s.abstract: Objective To understand the Quality of Life(QOL) among the middle-aged and elderly residents in Baoshan district and find the influencing factors,so as to provide a scientific basis for the intervention strategies and measures.Methods A questionnaire survey was conducted among 1 843 middle-aged and elderly residents by the three-stage stratified random sampling.The WHOQOL-BREF was used in the investigation.Results The QOL among the middle-aged and elderly residents in Baoshan district was better.Social relation domain had got the highest scores and the environment domain the lowest scores.Region,gender,age,education level,marital status,occupational status,income level,disease and a healthy lifestyle had greater impacts on the middle-aged and elderly residents.Conclusion The QOL of middle-aged and elderly residents in Baoshan district is in a middle level,the influencing factors for integrated interventions should be combined,so as to improve the QOL of the middle-aged and elderly residents.

ZOgsWc1O.title: Status Analysis of Health Education in Small and Middle-Scale Enterprises in Baoshan District,Shanghai
ZOgsWc1O.abstract: Objective To investigate the implementation of health education(HE) among small and middle-scale enterprises in Baoshan District,and to provide a basis for further HE decision.Methods Eighteen enterprises were randomly selected to survey.Then the status of HE was analyzed,especially in terms of problems existing in HE.Results The number of enterprises with professional or part-time HE staff was 13,accounting for 72.2%.Only 15.4% of the 13 HE staff had medical background and 61.5% of them participated in health education training.The rates of enterprises affording galleries,TV sets,tabloid newspapers were 44.4%,22.2%,22.2% respectively and most of them were the middle-scale ones.HE contents were mainly about occupational health and accidental injury prevention,accounting for 61.1% and 22.2% respectively.Ninety-four point four percent of the enterprises established a regulation of pre-job and job training.Eighty-three point three percent established physical examination and security system.The proportion of enterprises which carried out cafeteria management,implemented tobacco control and annual plan were 77.8%,66.7% and 44.4% respectively,50.0% posted no-smoking signs in public places,33.3% provided activity sites for working staff.The rates of enterprises developing employee health screening and health management were 83.3% and 72.2%.Those which provided psychological consulting,women's diseases survey and blood pressure measurement services accounted for 44.4%,27.8% and 22.2% respectively.Conclusion Health education in enterprises is supposed to be strengthened.Although small and middle-scale enterprises in Baoshan District have made some achievements in occupational health,the overall level of HE is still low.

0wUw5r19.title: Study on the contamination and distribution of virulence genes of Vibrio Parahaemolyticus in inland marketing aquatic products and environment
0wUw5r19.abstract: Objective To investigate the contamination of Vibrio Parahaemolyticus in inland markets,and reveal the distribution of its virulent genes,so as to provide basis for the effective control of food safety risk caused by Vp.Methods Samples of marketing aquatic products and their environment were collected in Jingzhou city,and Vp was islaoted,identificated,and their virulent genes were analyzed for tlh,trh,tdh,UreC and T3SS2(vsC2,vcrD2).Results Three hundred and sixty samples were collected,and 81 samples were detected for Vp,the total proportion was 22.50%,among which the detection proportion was the highest in marine products 31.28%(56 /179),while it was 16.42%(11 /67) in freshwater products.,There was significant difference between two kinds of products(0.01 < P < 0.05);The detection rate in supermarkets was 26.60%(50 /188),higher than those of farmers' markets rate,18.02%(31 /172).The monthly detection rate of Vp was from 3.33% to 36.67%,there was significant difference in different months(= 31.398,P < 0.01);The tlh gene in 81 isolates derived from food and environments was detected and positive,and the remaining genes were not found.Conclusions This study revealed the prevalence of Vp with low diversity virulence genes in the aquatic products in markets in Jingzhou city,an inland city of China;It revealed Vp's route of transmission from marine products to freshwater products which was through some intermediate links,such as farming water and products' surface etc;the tlh gene can be used for the detection and identification of Vp.

LHUlGDYk.title: Effectiveness evaluation of physical exercise among the residents of Baoshan District of Shanghai City
LHUlGDYk.abstract: Objective To investigate the effect of physical exercise among the residents of Baoshan District in Shanghai City in order to promote physical exercise development in the communities.Methods To collect the Baoshan District behavior risk factor surveillance database and analysis the result of persons' physical exercise activities in 2001,2004 to 2006.Results That people in urban area taking part in sport increased significantly from 2001,2004 to 2006(P<0.05).Most of the people were younger than 20 or older than 60(P<0.01).Besides,those in urban area taking part in physical exercise were more than those who in suburb area(P<0.01).The most important reason was that they hadn't enough time.Conclusion People more actively took part in physical exercise,but there are different on people's age and district distribute.We should take more intervention to improve it in education,policy,environment and so on,especially to those aged from 20～40 and those living in suburb area.

thJr03Bp.title: Relations between the Evaluation Results of Varied Question Types and Actual Public Knowledge Rates
thJr03Bp.abstract: Objective To analyze the relations between the evaluation results of varied questions types and actual public knowledge rates. Methods There were 4 questionnaires were composed based on 66 items of healthcare knowledge as people should know necessarily, and assigned among community residents. Analysis was conducted on the difference of knowledge rates of varied question types, and to figure out whether question type itself would cause vast variation of the results. Results There were significant differences in all 5 groups of different types of questions with the same content (P<0.01). Among the accuracy rates, the truth-descriptive True/False (T/F) questions took the first place, best-choice questions the second and false-descriptive T/F questions the worst. No significant difference was found among the six of seven study groups of true-descriptive T/F questions with the same content and question type, no significant difference as well in the three of five false-descriptive ones (P>0.05). Conclusion The results of evaluation differed largely among different question types. Because of the better performance in reflecting the actual knowledge, the choice question and the false-descriptive T/F question could be used more widely in a scientific way.

Cs1aSQpE.title: Comparison study on different approaches for nutrition education among community residents
Cs1aSQpE.abstract: Objective To compare the effects of different approaches for nutrition education,and to provide basis for further health communication among community residents.Methods 4 intervention groups were conducted different health education modes with 5 different methods,including disseminating brochures,regular training,exhibition boards,poster and short TV programs.Before and after intervention,questionnaire surveys were conducted to evaluate the effects.Results After intervention,the awareness rates of different knowledge items about nutrition were significantly increased in all 4 intervention groups(P<0.01).Before intervention the awareness rates were between 47.3% and 89.3%,and after intervention,the rates were between 53.6% and 99.3%.There were significantly differences between 4 intervention modes(P<0.01).The more education methods were used in intervention,the more obvious effect the intervention got.The effective combination of education methods could eliminate the trend that the awareness rate decreased as age increased and reduce the difference attributed to education levels.Conclusion In community nutrition education,the measures that could be population specific and reach wide population coverage would be the first choice,supplemented by interpersonal communication.

7L9D0LND.title: Status Quo and Influencing Factor on Life-quality of Elderly in Baoshan District, Shanghai
7L9D0LND.abstract: Objective To understand the elderly quality of life in BaoShan District, and explore the factors that affect the elderly’s physical exercise. Methods By the self-designed questionnaire, 1,188 old people were surveyed to analyze their life quality and its influencing factors. Results The scores of bodily-pain, role-emotional, physical-function, social-function and role-physical are higher, while those of general-health, vividness and mental-health are lower. In the scale of life quality, 888 of them belong to the intermediate level, accounting for 74.7%, and 300 people to the good level, accounting for 25.3%. The factors of gender, culture, number of children, and exercise were significant according to the multivariate regression analysis. Conclusion The elderly life quality has a better foundation in Baoshan District, which is influenced by many factors. The physical and mental health of the old people should be improved in terms of the community and the family.

cMMiyBly.title: Analysis on Related Factors of Successful Smoking Quitting
cMMiyBly.abstract: Objective To figure out the influential incentive of successful smoking quitting, based on the data from Baoshan District. Methods 5 635 people of 15 to 69 years old were investigated on their smoking and quitting status and related factors in Baoshan District by using behavioral risk factor monitoring method. Results The smoking rate in Baoshan male residents accounts for 54.4%, with no significant change in the latest 5 years(P>0.05). While the successful quitting rate takes up 7.9%. The participants of different age, occupation, or hypertension also have significant disparity with other groups(P<0.01). Smokers either older than 60, or nearly the age of retirement, or with hypertension present better quitting rate than their counterparts; Besides, adequate knowledge and attitude to the adversity of tobacco also contribute to a higher rate of successful smoking quitting(P<0.01). According to multivariate analysis, the initial incentives of successful smoking quitting are age, accompanying ailment and the awareness of smoking harmful results. Conclusion The prevalence of smoking in Baoshan District remained the same across time, with a relatively low rate of smoking quitting. These findings have implications for clinical and public health interventions to educate the residents, so as to reduce and prevent smoking.

tHUckma0.title: Monitoring and Analysis on the Supervision Results of Foodborne Pathogens in Jingzhou in 2012
tHUckma0.abstract: OBJECTIVE To understand the status and distribution of pathogen contamination of commercial available food in Jingzhou, and provide the basis for effective hygienic regulatory measures. METHODS According to " National manual of foodborne pathogens monitoring in 2012", 7 kinds of food were selected from city supermarkets, farmers' markets and other places to detect 9 kinds of pathogen indicators. RESULTS The foodborne pathogens were detected with an overall positive rate 14.34% from 488 samples in the research. The pathogen detected rate of local food hot-and-dry noodles was up to 52.63%, which was significantly higher than the average detected rate(P<0.01). The pathogen detected rates of food and beverages, infant food, baked and fried foods, cooked meat, vegetables and their products were 24.10%, 10.42%, 5.00%, 4.17% and 1.74% individually. There were no pathogens detected in fruits and their products. Pathogen detected rate of different sampling sites had no significant difference( P > 0. 05). CONCLUSION There are more serious hygienic problem in hot-and-dry noodles, food and beverage which represented salad vegetables, rice and flour products in Jingzhou. Supervision and management should be strengthen.
